TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeStyle Inherits Style
public ref class TreeNodeStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 表示 控件中节点的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来表示样式中的节点的控件。Use the class to represent the style of a node in the control. 控件允许您指定不同的样式特性 （如字体大小和颜色） 的每个不同的节点类型。The control allows you to specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different node types. 下表列出了支持的节点样式类。The following table lists the node styles that are supported by the class. |节点的样式属性Node style property|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||在鼠标指针置于其上时的节点的样式设置。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||叶节点的样式设置。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||节点的默认样式设置。The default style settings for a node.| ||父节点的样式设置。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根节点的样式设置。The style settings for the root node.| ||所选节点的样式设置。The style settings for a selected node.| 如果您设置节点的样式属性控件，它们会按以下顺序应用：When you set the node style properties of the control, they are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，具体取决于节点类型。, , or , depending on the node type. 3. 。. 4. 。. 5. 。. 类继承其大多数成员从类。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它扩展类通过提供控制的一个节点中的文本周围的空间，以及相邻节点之间的空间量的属性。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around the text in a node, as well as the space between adjacent nodes. 使用属性来控制和右边的节点中的文本的左侧的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the text in a node. 同样，属性控制节点中的文本之下，和更高版本的空间量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the text in a node. 你可以控制在节点之间的间距量，应用于通过设置及其相邻节点属性。You can control the amount of spacing between the node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes by setting the property. 若要控制的父节点和子节点之间的间距大小，请使用属性。To control the amount of spacing between a parent node and a child node, use the property. 有关继承的样式设置的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何控制中的父节点的外观通过设置的样式属性的控件从返回的对象属性。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control by setting the style properties of the object that is returned from the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified object information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例通过使用类指定的对象`bag`参数。Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class by using the object that is specified by the `bag` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ChildNodesPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用 类的父节点与子节点之间的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between a parent node and a child node to which the class is applied.

value.span: 父节点的子节点区域上方和下方的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is above and below the child nodes section of a parent node.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制和到节点的子节点区域下方的更高版本的空间量类应用。Use the property to control the amount of space above and below the child nodes section of the node to which the class is applied. 之间的父节点和其第一个子节点，以及其最后一个子节点的下一个节点之间插入此间距。This spacing is inserted between the parent node and its first child node, as well as between its last child node and the next node. > [!NOTE] > 如果没有其他节点后的最后一个子节点，因为这将留在控件底部不必要的间隙，则不会呈现后的最后一个子节点的空间。The space after the last child node is not rendered if there are no additional nodes following the last child node, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the bottom of the control. 若要控制子节点之间的空间量，请使用属性。To control the amount of space between child nodes, use the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的父节点的子节点区域上方和下方的空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the space above and below the child nodes section of a parent node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定 对象的样式属性复制到当前 对象。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的样式属性复制对象中调用此方法的对象。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!NOTE] > 在当前的所有属性对象中指定的相应属性替换为对象。All properties in the current object are replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要将样式属性复制而无需替换已设置任何值，请使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any values that have already been set, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将指定的样式属性复制对象插入调用此方法的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style properties of the specified object into the object that calls this method. 请注意，替换每个样式属性。Notice that every style property is replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/CS/treenodestylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/VB/treenodestylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置节点中文本左边和右边的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the text in the node.

value.span: 节点文本左边和右边的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is to the left and right of the node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制到的节点的文本周围的水平间隔量应用。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the node to which the is applied. 文本的左边的缘之间的边框的文本区域中，以及文本的右边缘的边框的文本之间插入此空格。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the right edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制的垂直间距，使用属性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制节点的文本周围的水平空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置节点旁显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 显示在节点旁边的自定义图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置 属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定样式的自定义映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for style. 此映像显示的节点旁边，并且它可以采用任何图像文件格式 （如.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等），只要客户端浏览器支持该格式。This image is displayed next to the node, and it can be in any image-file format (such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 如果这两个并属性设置，显示的图像是由指定的那个属性。If both the and properties are set, the image that is displayed is the one that is specified by the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

span.span: The selected value is .

span.span: The that will merge with the current node's settings.

summary.span: 将指定 对象的样式属性与当前 对象的样式属性组合在一起。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法指定的样式属性组合在一起对象的样式属性从中调用此方法的对象。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 方法通过设置每个属性的未设置在当前加入的样式属性对象中指定其相应的值与对象。The method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 更新尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set are updated. 如果在指定的属性对象未设置，在当前的相应属性对象不会更改。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法指定的样式属性组合在一起与对象调用此方法的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with those of the object that calls this method. 请注意，只有未设置属性替换为。Notice that only the unset properties are replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/CS/treenodestylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/VB/treenodestylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

member this.NodeSpacing : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用 对象的节点与相邻节点之间的垂直间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the node to which the object is applied and its adjacent nodes.

value.span: 应用 的节点与同一级别相邻节点之间的垂直间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of vertical space, in pixels, between the node to which the is applied and its adjacent nodes at the same level.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制节点之间的垂直间距量的应用于同一级别相邻节点。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes at the same level. 此空间是当前节点的上边缘和上一个节点的下边缘之间以及当前节点的下边缘之间插入的和上边缘的下一个节点。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current node and the lower edge of the previous node, as well as between the lower edge of the current node and upper edge of the next node. 中的第一个节点不呈现上部空间管理，因为这将留在控件顶部不必要的间隙。The upper space is not rendered for the first node in the control, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the top of the control. 和属性各自独立应用。The and properties are applied independently. 该值指示展开节点不会影响节点间距。Whether or not the node is expanded does not affect the node spacing. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定在树中的节点与同一级别相邻节点之间的垂直间距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical spacing between a node and its adjacent nodes at the same level in the tree. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来删除任何以前定义的样式元素和重置到其原始 （也就是说，默认值） 状态的对象。Use the method to remove any previously defined style elements and reset the object to its original (that is, default) state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以返回对象为其默认状态。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the object to its default state. summary.span: 获取或设置节点文本上方和下方的间距。

value.span: 节点文本上方和下方的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, above and below a node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制到的节点的文本周围的垂直间隔量类应用。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the node to which the class is applied. 文本的上边缘和文本区域的边框之间以及文本的下边缘和文本的边框之间插入此空格。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制水平间距，请使用属性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定节点的文本周围的垂直空间。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical space around the text of a node.
